title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Understanding the Process of Developing e-Learning Metrics for Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the seven core indicators of higher education e-learning (infrastructure, curriculum, technological resources, teaching/learning, learners, faculty, and assessment).
Learners can apply methods to construct an e-learning indicator system based on literature analysis results.
Learners can design a process to evaluate the validity and appropriateness of indicators through expert validation procedures.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
